video.title: Cutthroat Kitchen
video.synopsis: Four competing chefs are handed $25,000 and can use the money to either help themselves or sabotage their rivals. Just how far will they go to win?

episodes.synopsis: The chefs bid to freeze an unlucky opponent for 10 minutes. Later on, a chef must use strange ingredients to make chicken wings.
episodes.title: Wing It

episodes.synopsis: A chef must make tacos with bologna. Later, the contestants try to derail each other's Eggs Benedict, and a chef tries to keep a crab cake together.
episodes.title: Tac'o the Town

episodes.synopsis: The chefs attempt to make a pork chop and applesauce dish without pork chops or apples. Later, they compete to make the perfect mac and cheese.
episodes.title: Porkchops and Sabatoges

episodes.synopsis: A chef gets burned when making an edible French toast with charred bread, and a chef must make a lobster roll without utensils.
episodes.title: Vive le Sabotage

episodes.synopsis: A chef makes waves as he forces an opponent to make cupcakes in a microwave oven. Another chef is forced to use pie crust as a pizza crust.
episodes.title: Let Them Eat Cupcakes

episodes.synopsis: One chef tries to turn junk food into ravioli; another must make a burger on a camp stove; and someone has to serve giblets with fried chicken.
episodes.title: Winner, Winner, Chicken Dinner

episodes.synopsis: One chef forces another to create grilled cheese with a hand torch. Later, a sadistic chef makes his opponent fill a shepherd's pie with beef jerky.
episodes.title: Tiny Tools, Big Problems

episodes.synopsis: A chef is challenged to make a perfect omelet on the underside of a pan. Later, one chef forces another to serve bananas foster on a stick.
episodes.title: Steak Out

episodes.synopsis: Chefs compete to force a rival to make nachos without utensils. One chef hands in herbs and spices and must use jelly beans to flavor a savory dish.
episodes.title: Kiss My Grits

episodes.synopsis: A chef is ordered to wear oven mitts while rolling up his burrito; later, he's forced to harvest all of his water from whole coconuts.
episodes.title: Humble Pie

episodes.synopsis: A chef is forced to cut ingredients for a jambalaya, and a chef "meats" their match when they get "creamed" by meatloaf and mashed potatoes.
episodes.title: Un-Holy Trinity

episodes.synopsis: One chef attempts lasagna as they make an opponent grate a three-pound block of Parmesan. Another denies his opponent the chance to taste their chili.
episodes.title: Chicken Cordon 'Blue'

episodes.synopsis: In a fiery barbecue round, two chefs have to share their cook time. Later, the competition gets heated when a chef is forced to build a campfire.
episodes.title: S'more Sabotage

episodes.synopsis: A chef must rise to the challenge when forced to use large geoduck clams for his clam dish, and a chef must cook an entire meal using a clothes iron.
episodes.title: Wham, Clam, Thank You, Ma'am

episodes.synopsis: A chef must either cook with canned chicken or forfeit cooking time, two chefs must share utensils and a very small kitchen poses a big challenge.
episodes.title: Cutthroat Kiddy Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: A chef has to make gnocchi with a potato masher attached to his hand, and another discovers unexpected ingredients in place of his ice cream toppings.
episodes.title: Duck, Duck, Gnocchi

episodes.synopsis: A chef has to get creative with honey-doused pot sticker wrappers, and two chefs are challenged to make their best PB&J -- but must share ingredients.
episodes.title: Shrimp or Get Off Pot Sticker

episodes.synopsis: Giada De Laurentiis is a guest judge on this episode where one chef must cook with canned chicken and another must use sugar cane in a dessert.
episodes.title: The Yolk's on You

episodes.synopsis: Cooking a quesadilla using a 500-watt work light and preparing chicken soup on a cookie sheet are among the challenges the chefs face in this episode.
episodes.title: Soupsy Daisy

episodes.synopsis: Among this episode's challenges, a chef has to build a fire to cook his kebabs, and another must mold French fries out of mashed potatoes.
episodes.title: A Penny for Your Chocolates

episodes.synopsis: The chefs face various challenges such as having to start their huevos rancheros over from scratch or keeping their cool over a damaged crepe pan.
episodes.title: A Crepe-y Situation

episodes.synopsis: A chef must use water he harvests from coconuts to make pad Thai, and two chefs are tasked with making potato skins using skinless potatoes.
episodes.title: Melts in Your Pot, Not in Your Hand

episodes.synopsis: Two chefs get a hardcore lesson in improvising when told to switch dishes during a challenge, and a chef must craft a chowder bowl using sliced bread.
episodes.title: Fowl Play

episodes.synopsis: Four chefs get another chance to prove themselves, a chef must cook a pasta dish using a chemistry set and a chef's hot dogs meet an undignified end.
episodes.title: Gluttons for Punishment

episodes.synopsis: Three chefs get creative with everyday breakfast appliances, and a chef must rethink his calzone recipe when all the cheese is replaced with tiramisu.
episodes.title: It's Not Delivery, It's Old Delivery

episodes.synopsis: The chefs face more grueling challenges: One must cook a dish with only tin foil and heat, and another has to cook mussels with a clothes steamer.
episodes.title: Pressed or Steamed

episodes.synopsis: One contestant has to find a way to make ramen with no noodles while three chefs face the task of making a BLT without any of the titular ingredients.
episodes.title: A Few Good Ramen

episodes.synopsis: A chef is forced to prepare a breakfast burrito in bed, while another must use alcohol as the only source of heat to prepare a bar snack.
episodes.title: Breakfast in Bed

episodes.synopsis: Challenges involve a Hawaiian plate lunch, a pesto pasta dish and finding a way to use olive oil capsules in making muffins.
episodes.title: Hawaii 5-Oh No

episodes.synopsis: Two chefs get uncomfortably close in the process of making pea soup. A chef is forced to use lamb shears instead of knives.
episodes.title: Two Chefs in a Pod

episodes.synopsis: A chef has to make a layer cake using a cement mixer, while another comes up with a hot version of the iconic Cobb salad.
episodes.title: Chain of Tools

episodes.synopsis: A chef finds that making General Tso's chicken is tough with trapped fingers. Another chef must use hockey skates instead of knives to slice and dice.
episodes.title: Tso Good

episodes.synopsis: A chef is forced to painstakingly separate individual grains of rice to make risotto. One chef has to chip ingredients out of a solid block of ice.
episodes.title: The Rice Stuff

episodes.synopsis: A chef must prepare French onion soup in serving ladles, while other challenges involve blackened fish and making dessert with smashed bananas.
episodes.title: Ladel-ayheehoo

episodes.synopsis: Chefs have to make sloppy Joes using a meat of unknown origin. Other challenges require the chefs to use chicken wire and participate in a carnival.
episodes.title: Life's a Mystery... Meat

episodes.synopsis: A bunch of eggshells complicate the production of a frittata. A chef has to cook using old supplies from a yard sale, and one chef shreds a steak.
episodes.title: Hakuna Frittata

episodes.synopsis: One chef has to fish cooking gear out of a tangled net, while other challenges involve a grill suit and making a barbecue chicken sandwich.
episodes.title: Well, Hot Clam

episodes.synopsis: It's the judges' turn to compete, dealing with challenges like cooking with one hand tied behind their back. Alton also conducts a meatball lottery.
episodes.title: Judging Judges

episodes.synopsis: A chef has a tough time with a challenge involving a rhyme, and a contestant has to demonstrate agility while cooking a chicken pot pie.
episodes.title: Panini, Meeny, Miny, Moe

episodes.synopsis: One chef tries to make pasta Bolognese in an Italian espresso pot, and another must make tres leches cake using milk straight from a cow.
episodes.title: I Can't Believe It's Not Udder

episodes.synopsis: A contestant gets dinged for taking shortcuts making pizza, and another must dig up all necessary ingredients from an unusual vegetable garden.
episodes.title: You Wanna Pizza This?

episodes.synopsis: One contestant bakes a cake while walking around the kitchen on cake boxes, and another must find a way to cook using only a giant whisk.
episodes.title: Anything but a Cake Walk

episodes.synopsis: One chef is hit with a challenge when golf clubs replace cooking tools, and another faces a sneaky sabotage involving coffee and doughnuts.
episodes.title: Big Trouble in Little Chinese Chicken Salad

episodes.synopsis: One lucky chef gets to cook using Alton's jungle torch, and a mishap with a giant fondue pot creates a disaster in the kitchen.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Jungle

episodes.synopsis: Two chefs must work in tight quarters, one makes a sandwich with a cigar cutter, and another whips up tiramisu using coffee filters and stirrers.
episodes.title: I Like My Peppers Pulverized

episodes.synopsis: A contestant must make serious adjustments when regular ginger is swapped out for sushi ginger, and Alton passes on the Olympic cooking torch.
episodes.title: Two Chefs, One Toga

episodes.synopsis: One contestant takes on the challenge of cooking soup with a single-serve coffee maker, and Alton asks the chefs to serve up milkshakes for dessert.
episodes.title: Ho-Ley Pot

episodes.synopsis: One contestant sees if a phone booth can turn an ordinary chef into a super chef, and another tries to ride a bike in the kitchen.
episodes.title: Superhero Sabotage

episodes.synopsis: A chef must make a lobster roll using waterlogged bread, and a strange chocolate platter comes out during a cake challenge.
episodes.title: The Eggs-Orcist

episodes.synopsis: One chef recalls the good old days with a casserole, one takes on a red velvet maze, and another attempts to cook while riding a scooter.
episodes.title: When in Rome

episodes.synopsis: One chef tries to use freezer-burned items to make a chili cheese dog, one works at a spinning cooking station, and Alton reveals his new pasta art.
episodes.title: Chili'd to the Bone

episodes.synopsis: One chef gets a boost from Buddha, two other contestants must shop for each other, and Alton becomes the target in a shooting game.
episodes.title: Tongue Thai-ed
